sentences.english: Anybody who set himself up as king, without being appointed king by the Senate, that was itself an act of treason.
sentences.chinese: 任何人自稱爲王，而不受元老院冊封，那就是叛國罪。

sentences.english: The punishment for treason is death.
sentences.chinese: 對叛國罪的處罰是處死。

sentences.english: The couple were tried for treason.
sentences.chinese: 這對夫婦因叛國罪受審。
異議人士按叛國罪論處。

sentences.english: Her enemies were accusing her of treason.
sentences.chinese: 她的敵人們控訴她犯下叛國罪。

sentences.english: All were found guilty of high treason.
sentences.chinese: 所有人都被裁定犯有叛國罪。

sentences.english: He added that they would be punished for their "treasonous acts".
sentences.chinese: 他補充說，他們將會被處罰“叛國罪有關行爲”。

sentences.english: Brown was tried and convicted of treason.
sentences.chinese: 布朗以叛國罪受到審訊及定罪。

sentences.english: He was beheaded for high treason.
He was arraigned for high treason.
